channel.title: Spawn an npc
channel.description:
Well i was wondering how do i make it so if you wait 10 minutes an npc will spawn... i know this >>>>>[color=blue]server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(NPCID, XCORD, YCORD, heightLevel);[/color]<<<<
deltascape source only :P

item.title: Spawn an npc
item.dc:creator: @str_by_zammy str by zammy
item.description:
@str_by_zammy wrote:

[quote=“Mr Mopar, post:3, topic:291414”][quote author=str by zammy link=topic=385117.msg2888460#msg2888460 date=1248750488]
System.currentTimeMillis() - NpcSpawnTimer >= millisecondshere)) {

There is an easier way but i’ll let you figure that out

  • there is 1000 milliseconds in a second
  • declare your timer
    [/quote]
    ty
    wish i could rep you for your help[/quote]

Me too, enough rep talk XD

Goodluck =]

Read full topic
